text.text: The Fuchsia-Massif site operated at various times between 1917 and 1989. Production totalled 292,686,672 grams (9,410,095 oz.) silver and 376,053 lbs. cobalt from the No. 3 shaft.
The property still has all three existing shafts, and totals 78 square kilometres where only silver in a small area was targeted.
